note.p: Orphan in the South American Mission Society orphanage at Ushuaia in the Beagle Channel, Patagonia. Renamed Orphie Loftus. Married Alfred Mahteen in October 1879.
Letter from B. J. Sulivan, 2 January [1880]
South American Missionary Magazine, 1 October 1879, p. 223; 1 December 1879, p. 258; 2 January 1882, p. 15.
